LONDON( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. So far, our worst day in government, a senior David Cameron aide told The Guardian after Andy Coulson quit Friday, bowing to pressure over what he knew about hacking at the News of the World( NOTW) when he was its editor. David Letterman .`` Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business,'' Billy Joel said in a statement.
